title: Why Jordan Peterson had to bring back "God" to save Science
description:
What can't "Rationality Rules" see of it's own position as he debunks Jordan Peterson? Why does jBP bring God back into the conversation in order to save science and it monarchical view of the real? 

Rationality Rules Debunks JBP https://youtu.be/AwXAB6cICG0 

Richard Dawking on Unbelievable not minding at all the "reasonable" Christians he's debating. https://youtu.be/p5_0Fx_RICI 

CS Lewis "Is Theology Poetry" http://www.samizdat.qc.ca/arts/lit/Theology=Poetry_CSL.pdf
